summary: The implementation successfully addresses all six requirements (REQ-42 through REQ-47) for the 20% tax deduction feature. Backend changes include adding tax fields to deposit and winning records, computing tax in deposit/release functions, and providing a migration script. Frontend changes include displaying tax breakdowns in DepositSection, AdminFundsReleaseSection, and AdminPage release history table. All components show gross amounts, 20% tax deductions, and net amounts with proper KES formatting.

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module (backend/migration.mo) to migrate existing deposit transactions by adding taxAmount field
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly states 'Existing transaction and winning records must remain intact during backend updates' as a constraint, but does not request a migration module or migration logic. The migration.mo file and migration application in main.mo were not specified in any requirement.
